vital.name: Health
vital.description: Represents the character's life. Depletes when damaged.

vital.name: Mana
vital.description: Used to cast spells and abilities. Depletes when used.

vital.name: Energy
vital.description: Short-term resource used for quick actions. Depletes rapidly.

vital.name: Rage
vital.description: Builds up as the character takes or deals damage.

vital.name: Sanity
vital.description: Represents mental stability. Depletes when exposed to horrors.

attribute.name: Strength
attribute.description: Physical power, affects melee damage and carrying capacity.

attribute.name: Dexterity
attribute.description: Agility and reflexes, influences accuracy and evasion.

attribute.name: Intelligence
attribute.description: Mental acuity, enhances spellcasting and problem-solving.

attribute.name: Constitution
attribute.description: Endurance and resilience, boosts health and stamina.

attribute.name: Wisdom
attribute.description: Perception and insight, improves decision-making and resistance to mental effects.
